original: Ihrfelt, Gösta Vilhelm, kanslichef, förste stadsombudsman, Norrköping, f. 15/5/88 i Sthlm av v. här:hövd. Fredrik N :s’on L o. Jenny Sandberg. G. 19 m. Elsa Holmberg. Barn: Per f. 19, Kerstin 24. — Mog:ex. 07, res:-off :ex. 09, kansliex. 10, jur. kand. 14. Löjtn. i Svea livg. res. t. 21. Tings- 0. hovr :tjg. 14-21, kanslichef o. förste stadsomb :man i Norrköp. sed. 21. Ordf. i fören. Sv:es komm. förvaltn:-jurister sed. 41. RVO, RFinlLOlkl, FinlRK förtj:t. i silver.
translated: Ihrfelt, Gösta Vilhelm, office chief, first city solicitor, Norrköping, born on May 15, 1888 in Stockholm to auxiliary captain Fredrik N's son L and Jenny Sandberg. Married in 1919 to Elsa Holmberg. Children: Per, born in 1919, Kerstin, born in 1924. Military: officer's examination in 1907, reserve officer's examination in 1909, office chief examination in 1910, law degree in 1914. Lieutenant in Svea Livgarde until 1921. District and appellate court clerk from 1914 to 1921, office chief and first city solicitor in Norrköping since 1921. Chairman of the Association of Swedish Municipal Administration Jurists since 1941. Awarded with the Royal Swedish Order of Vasa, the Finnish Order of the Lion Knight, and the Finnish Order of Merit.

memberOf.name: Association of Swedish Municipal Administration Jurists
